combined_text: mediterranean dipping oil allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1/2 cup olive oil 1 tablespoon fresh oregano 2 tablespoons fresh dill 3 tablespoons feta cheese 2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes 2 tablespoons pimento-stuffed olives 1 garlic clove 1 teaspoon smoked paprika 1 lemon, zested 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper gather all ingredients. whisk olive oil, oregano, dill, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, garlic, paprika, lemon zest, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until well blended. serve and enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup olive oil", "1 tablespoon fresh oregano", "2 tablespoons fresh dill", "3 tablespoons feta cheese", "2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes", "2 tablespoons pimento-stuffed olives", "1 garlic clove", "1 teaspoon smoked paprika", "1 lemon, zested", "1/4 teaspoon salt", "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper"]

description: Try these big batch espresso martinis that are stored in your freezer. Sweet coffee liqueur, smooth vodka and fresh brewed espresso combine in this delicious martini variation.
combined_text: big batch espresso martinis allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 (750 ml bottle vodka 1 cup coffee liqueur 4 tablespoons espresso powder 2 tablespoons simple syrup 1 pinch sea salt water, as needed ice coffee beans for garnish (optional) gather all ingredients. pour out 1 ?¬ cups of the vodka bottle. reserve poured-out vodka for another use. pour 1/2 of the remaining vodka from the bottle into a small saucepan and warm over low heat for 1 to 2 minutes (do not boil). remove from heat and immediately whisk in the espresso powder until fully dissolved and no lumps remain. allow the mixture to cool for 5-10 minutes before proceeding. add the cooled vodka espresso mixture, coffee liquor, simple syrup, and a pinch of sea salt to the vodka bottle. cap and shake gently to mix. freeze for at least 4 hours before serving. note: mixture will not fully freeze due to the alcohol content. to serve, fill a cocktail shaker with ice and add 3 ounces of the mixture. dilute with ?« ounce water per individual serving. shake vigorously for 15 to 20 seconds. strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass. garnish with 3 coffee beans or a dusting of espresso powder, if desired.
ingredients_raw: ["1 (750 ml bottle vodka", "1 cup coffee liqueur", "4 tablespoons espresso powder", "2 tablespoons simple syrup", "1 pinch sea salt", "water, as needed", "ice", "coffee beans for garnish (optional)"]

description: This copycat Taco Bell Baja sauce is an easy-to-make sauce that pairs perfectly with fish and shrimp tacos, or other Mexican dishes, such as tortas, burritos and tostadas.
combined_text: copycat taco bell baja sauce allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 cup mayonnaise 1 jalapeno 1/2 red pepper, 2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder 1/2 teaspoon onion powder 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/2 teaspoon oregano 1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper 1/2 lime, juiced gather all ingredients. combine mayonnaise, jalapeno, red pepper, parmesan, mustard powder, onion powder, garlic powder, cayenne, oregano, salt, black pepper, and lime juice in the cup of a blender. blend until smooth. refrigerate sauce for a minimum of 1 hour for flavors to develop.
ingredients_raw: ["1 cup mayonnaise", "1 jalapeno", "1/2 red pepper,", "2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 teaspoon mustard powder", "1/2 teaspoon onion powder", "1/2 teaspoon garlic powder", "1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "1/2 teaspoon oregano", "1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper", "1/2 lime, juiced"]

description: Make this 4-ingredient bruschetta dip when you need a quick and delicious appetizer! With only Boursin cheese, grape tomatoes, basil, and balsamic vinegar, it could not be simpler and tastes fantastic with toasted bread or crackers.
combined_text: 4-ingredient bruschetta dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 (5.2 counce) spreadable gourmet cheese, 8 grape tomatoes, chopped 5 basil leaves, 2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar 1 small ciabatta roll, gather all ingredients. spread soft cheese onto a plate to cover. layer tomatoes on top, then scatter basil on top of tomatoes. drizzle with balsamic. serve with ciabatta or crackers.
ingredients_raw: ["1 (5.2 counce) spreadable gourmet cheese,", "8 grape tomatoes, chopped", "5 basil leaves,", "2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar", "1 small ciabatta roll,"]

description: In this state fair pickle lemonade, sour dill pickles and tart lemons bring serious pucker to a summer favorite.
combined_text: state fair pickle lemonade allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 lemon 1 dill pickle spear, such as grillo's 1/4 cup white cane sugar 1 ( 32 ounce pickle container or deli container with lid wooden muddler ice as needed 2 cups water 1/4 cup pickle juice lemon slices or pickle spears gather all ingredients. combine lemon wedges, chopped pickle spear, and sugar together in a deli container. muddle firmly for 1 minute, or until the lemon rinds are broken down and juice is fully extracted. the mixture should be aromatic and syrupy. add ice, water, and pickle juice to the muddled mixture. place lid on the container and shake well. insert a straw and enjoy directly from the container, or, strain the mixture through a mesh strainer for a smoother lemonade. garnish with a lemon slice and pickle spear. enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1 lemon", "1 dill pickle spear, such as Grillo's", "1/4 cup white cane sugar", "1 ( 32 ounce pickle container or deli container with lid", "wooden muddler", "ice as needed", "2 cups water", "1/4 cup pickle juice", "lemon slices or pickle spears"]

description: Summer camp inspired, no-bake golden grahams s'mores bars come together without an ovenƒ??or a campfire. Made with golden grahams cereal, marshmallows, and chocolate chips, they really bring the nostalgia. Similar to a rice krispy treat, these bars are low lift and high impact.
combined_text: golden grahams s'mores bars allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon unsalted butter 1 (11 ounce) bag milk chocolate or semisweet chocolate chips 1 (10 ounce) bag mini marshmallows, divided 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 (11 ounce) box graham cereal, such as golden grahams?? salt, such as maldon gather all ingredients. grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with 1 tablespoon butter. in a heavy-bottomed pot or double boiler, melt remaining 1/2 cup butter. turn off heat; add chocolate chips and 3/4 of marshmallows. stirring constantly, return to low heat to melt evenly. this may take 5 to 10 minutes. stir in vanilla extract and salt. add golden grahams to a large bowl; pour in melted mixture and toss until well coated. set aside a few marshmallows for topping, and stir in remaining marshmallows. press into the prepared baking dish, top with the last few marshmallows, and scatter over a pinch of flaky salt. refrigerate until completely chilled, at least 1 hour. slice with a sharp knife to serve.
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon unsalted butter", "1 (11 ounce) bag milk chocolate or semisweet chocolate chips", "1 (10 ounce) bag mini marshmallows, divided", "1 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1 (11 ounce) box graham cereal, such as Golden Grahams??", "salt, such as Maldon"]

description: This green goddess egg salad is a unique twist on traditional egg salad with an herb-rich dressing. It makes a great sandwich on any bread, an appetizer on crostini, or just serve over some tasty fresh greens.
combined_text: green goddess egg salad allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 6 large hard boiled eggs, 1/4 cup mayonnaise 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh dill 1 1/2 tablespoons chives 2 teaspoons dijon mustard 1 teaspoon parsley 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1/2 teaspoon anchovy paste (optional) salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste gather all ingredients. roughly chop eggs and place in a bowl. in a small bowl, whisk mayonnaise, dill, chives, dijon, parsley, lemon juice, and anchovy paste together until smooth. season with salt and pepper. add dressing to chopped eggs, and gently fold in until well combined. cover and refrigerate if not serving immediately.
ingredients_raw: ["6 large hard boiled eggs,", "1/4 cup mayonnaise", "1 1/2 tablespoons fresh dill", "1 1/2 tablespoons chives", "2 teaspoons Dijon mustard", "1 teaspoon parsley", "1 teaspoon lemon juice", "1/2 teaspoon anchovy paste (optional)", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste"]

description: These easy cherry brownies are perfect for those times when you get a craving for chocolaty, fudge-y brownies, and you want them quick and easy. There are some fabulous brownie mixes out there, and when you add fresh cherries and nuts, you're in for a special treat.
combined_text: easy cherry brownies allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1/3 cup vegetable oil 1/4 cup water 1 large egg 1 teaspoon almond extract ( 1 (18- ounce) packagebrownie mix, such as brownie mix, such as 1 cup fresh dark sweet cherries, 1/3 cup pecans preheat the oven to 325 degrees f (165 degrees c). line an 8x8-inch pan with parchment paper, leaving an overhang on two sides for easy removal, and spray with cooking spray. combine oil, water, egg, and vanilla extract in a large bowl. stir in brownie mix until well combined. gently fold in cherries and pecan nuts. spread out batter evenly in the prepared pan. bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, and the edges start to pull away from the sides of the pan, 44 to 48 minutes. cool completely in the pan. lift out of the pan using the parchment paper, cut, and serve.
ingredients_raw: ["1/3 cup vegetable oil", "1/4 cup water", "1 large egg", "1 teaspoon almond extract (", "1 (18- ounce) packagebrownie mix, such as brownie mix, such as", "1 cup fresh dark sweet cherries,", "1/3 cup pecans"]

description: These bang bang chicken sliders are a fun summer slider, made with pan-fried breaded chicken breast and an easy homemade bang bang sauce. We fancied ours up with lettuce from the garden.
combined_text: bang bang chicken sliders allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 1/2 pounds chicken breas 1 large egg 1/4 cup water 1 cup all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1 teaspoon ground coriander 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon ground black pepper 2 cups panko bread crumbs 1 cup avocado oil or other vegetable oil, or more as needed for frying gather all ingredients. line a baking sheet with parchment and set aside. cut flattened chicken into about 12 pieces. combine egg and water in a shallow bowl. combine flour, garlic powder, cayenne, coriander, salt, and black pepper in another shallow bowl; mix lightly. add panko to a third shallow bowl. dip each chicken piece into egg wash, then into flour mixture. dip again into egg wash, then into panko. once thoroughly coated, place on the prepared baking sheet. place the pan in the refrigerator to chill. meanwhile, for bang bang sauce, stir mayonnaise, sweet chili sauce, hot sauce, and rice vinegar together in a small bowl. pour into a squirt bottle if desired. set aside. heat oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat. cover a large platter or plate with paper towels and set near the stove. remove chicken from the refrigerator and carefully add to the oil, 1 piece at a time. fry one side until golden brown, about 3 minutes, then turn. fry an additional 3 minutes until chicken is no longer pink at the center and juices run clear. an instant read thermometer inserted near the center of chicken should read 165 degrees f (74 degrees c). remove to the prepared plate and repeat with remaining chicken. for sliders, cut rolls in half horizontally and lightly toast. squeeze or spread some bang bang sauce on the bottom half, then lay down 2 lettuce leaves. top with 1 piece of chicken. layer on some more bang bang sauce and top with other half of roll. enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1 1/2 pounds chicken breas", "1 large egg", "1/4 cup water", "1 cup all-purpose flour", "1 teaspoon garlic powder", "1 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "1 teaspoon ground coriander", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon ground black pepper", "2 cups panko bread crumbs", "1 cup avocado oil or other vegetable oil, or more as needed for frying"]

description: Baked Italian meatballs served over garlic Parmesan noodles. They're so good, and despite the long list of ingredients, most are seasonings, so they are not difficult to make.
combined_text: italian meatballs on parmesan noodles allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1/2 cup seasoned bread crumbs 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley 1 tablespoon dried oregano 1/2 tablespoon garlic or garlic paste 1/2 tablespoon kosher salt 1/2 tablespoon black pepper 1 teaspoon dried basil 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes 1 large egg, 1/4 cup milk 1 1/4 cups beef broth 1 pound ground beef preheat the oven to 425 degrees f (225 degrees c). combine breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, oregano, garlic, salt, black pepper, basil, and red pepper flakes in a bowl and mix together with a fork. stir in egg, milk, and 1/4 cup beef broth. add ground beef and stir with a fork just until combined. with wet hands, roll meat mixture into medium-sized balls and place in a large casserole dish. pour in 1 cup beef broth, or enough to fill the casserole 1/4 inch deep. sprinkle meatballs with parmesan cheese. bake meatballs in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. turn meatballs over, and bake until no longer pink at the center, about 15 minutes more. for noodles, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. add noodles and cook until tender with a bite, about 10 minutes; drain. place noodles in a bowl and immediately add butter, garlic paste, parmesan, oil, black pepper, and parsley. stir to combine. remove meatballs from the oven. to serve, spoon noodles onto a plate and top with meatballs. sprinkle with more parsley. enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup seasoned bread crumbs", "1/2 cup Parmesan cheese,", "1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley", "1 tablespoon dried oregano", "1/2 tablespoon garlic or garlic paste", "1/2 tablespoon kosher salt", "1/2 tablespoon black pepper", "1 teaspoon dried basil", "1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes", "1 large egg,", "1/4 cup milk", "1 1/4 cups beef broth", "1 pound ground beef"]

description: Meet peach cobbler: in cookie form! This thumbprint-style cookie is filled with warm-spiced peach filling, just like peach cobbler. To prevent the cookies from getting too soft, keep the extras stored in the refrigerator.
combined_text: peach cobbler cookies allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 cups fresh peaches 1/3 cup brown sugar 1 tablespoon unsalted butter 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1 pinch salt 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice 1 1/2 teaspoons cornstarch for filling: place peaches, brown sugar, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt to a small saucepan over medium heat. cook, stirring frequently, until mixture is boiling and sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. stir lemon juice and cornstarch together in a small bowl until thoroughly combined; pour into the peaches and stir to thoroughly incorporate. continue to cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, 2 to 3 minutes. pour mixture into a heatproof container and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, about 1 hour, or up to 2 days. for cookie dough: beat butter, brown sugar, 1/2 cup white sugar, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg together with an electric mixer until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. add in egg, vanilla, and almond extract and beat for 1 minute more. add in flour, baking powder, and baking soda and mix on low speed until mixture comes together in a stiff dough. pour remaining 1/4 cup white sugar into a small bowl and set aside. scoop out 1 1/2 tablespoons dough and roll it into a ball. roll dough ball in white sugar until thoroughly coated. using your thumb or the handle of a wooden spoon or spatula, press an indentation into the center of the cookie measuring about 3/4-inch wide and about 1/3-inch deep. repeat process with remaining cookie dough. remove filling from the refrigerator. place about 1 1/2 teaspoons filling into the indentation of each cookie, heaping the filling into the center of the cookies. refrigerate filled cookies for 30 minutes. preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c) and line baking sheets with parchment. place cookies about 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets. bake cookies, 1 pan at a time, in the preheated oven until edges begin to turn golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes. cool cookies on the pan for 5 minutes; remove to a wire rack to cool completely. store cooled cookies in the refrigerator.
ingredients_raw: ["1 cups fresh peaches", "1/3 cup brown sugar", "1 tablespoon unsalted butter", "1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract", "1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon", "1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg", "1 pinch salt", "2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice", "1 1/2 teaspoons cornstarch"]

description: These gochujang pork belly bites are sweet and spicy, crispy and crunchy, and absolutely delicious. Whether you finish them with the gochujang sauce in the air fryer, or just dip them in the sauce at the end, they are irresistibly good.
combined_text: gochujang pork belly bites allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 pound pork belly 1/4 cup gochujang 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon honey, 1 teaspoon ground ginger preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). place pork belly pieces in the basket in a single layer, not touching. air fry for 8 to 9 minutes; turn over and air fry for 6 to 7 minutes more. meanwhile, for sauce, stir gochujang, soy sauce, hot honey, and ginger together in a medium bowl. remove pork belly from air fryer basket; toss in sauce to coat. return to the air fryer and fry until bites begin to char at the edges, 8 to 11 minutes more. (alternately, you can use sauce only for dipping; in this case, continue to fry without removing bites, until they begin to char, 6 to 7 minutes.)
ingredients_raw: ["1 pound pork belly", "1/4 cup gochujang", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 tablespoon honey,", "1 teaspoon ground ginger"]

recipe_title: Sheet Pan Honey Mustard Salmon and Green Beans
description: This sheet pan honey mustard salmon and green beans features both beans and flaky roast salmon in the same lovely honey-Dijon sauce. Sheet pan meals are so convenient, and covering the sheet pan with aluminum foil makes cleanup a breeze.
combined_text: sheet pan honey mustard salmon and green beans allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes cooking spray 3 (5 ounce) filets salmon, with skin on and about 1-inch thick at thickest part salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste 3 cups green beans, trimmed 2 tablespoons olive oil 1/4 cup honey 1/4 cup dijon mustard 1/2 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional) lemon slices, preheat the oven to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c), and place an oven rack in the center. line a sheet pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. place salmon on a plate, pat both sides dry with paper towels, and season lightly with salt and pepper. let stand at room temperature while other ingredients are prepared. bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat. add green beans and bring back to a boil. immediately transfer green beans to an ice bath and cool for 2 to 3 minutes. drain well, and blot as much water as possible with paper towels. stir olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, lemon zest, lemon juice, garlic, and cayenne together in a medium bowl. set 2 tablespoons of honey mustard aside in a small bowl. brush a small amount of honey mustard over both sides of salmon. place filets on one end of the prepared pan, skin side down. toss green beans in the bowl with remaining honey mustard. spread seasoned green beans on the sheet pan in an even layer, opposite the salmon. bake in the center of the preheated oven until the interior temperature of salmon is about 120 degrees f (49 degrees c), about 14 minutes. allow more time for thicker filets. turn on the oven's broiler, and broil salmon and beans until sauce is bubbly and salmon and beans begin to brown, about 2 minutes. remove from the oven, brush salmon with reserved honey mustard using a clean brush, garnish with additional lemon slices, and serve warm.
ingredients_raw: ["cooking spray", "3 (5 ounce) filets salmon, with skin on and about 1-inch thick at thickest part", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste", "3 cups green beans, trimmed", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "1/4 cup honey", "1/4 cup Dijon mustard", "1/2", "2 cloves garlic,", "1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)", "lemon slices,"]

description: These grilled pineapple lime chicken thighs are tender, juicy, and flavorful. They marinate briefly in seasoned lime and pineapple juices, and are scattered with pineapple chunks after grilling.
combined_text: grilled pineapple lime chicken thighs allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1/2 cup pineapple juice 2 limes, divided 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil 1 1/2 teaspoon salt-free adobo seasoning 1 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste (optional) 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs 1/2 cup pineapple pieces cilantro sprigs, for garnish (optional) combine pineapple juice, zest and juice of 1 lime, olive oil, adobo seasoning, salt, and cayenne, in a large resealable plastic bag. gently squeeze the bag to mix marinade. add chicken thighs to marinade, and gently squeeze contents to coat chicken. move thighs inside the bag into a single layer. gently press out the air, reseal, and refrigerate for 1 hour or up to 2 hours, turning every 20 minutes or so. preheat an outdoor grill to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). clean and oil the grates. place chicken on the oiled grate and drizzle with marinade. grill 2 to 3 minutes, give each piece a quarter turn, and grill 2 or 3 minutes more. turn chicken over and repeat. grill until chicken is no longer pink at the center and juices run clear. an instant read thermometer inserted near the center should reach 165 degrees f (74 degrees c). remove chicken to a plate, cover with foil, and rest for 8 to 10 minutes. cut remaining lime in half and squeeze 1 lime half over chicken. cut the other lime half into slices. sprinkle pineapple pieces over the chicken; garnish with lime slices and cilantro sprigs.
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup pineapple juice", "2 limes, divided", "1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil", "1 1/2 teaspoon salt-free adobo seasoning", "1 teaspoon salt,", "1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste (optional)", "1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs", "1/2 cup pineapple pieces", "cilantro sprigs, for garnish (optional)"]

description: For this Mediterranean flatbread, spread ready-made flatbread with a layer of cream cheese, top with garlicky spinach, artichoke hearts, Kalamata olives, and feta, then bake briefly in a very hot oven. It's a quick, delicious appetizer built on convenience.
combined_text: mediterranean flatbread allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 piece flatbread 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened 1/2 pound frozen spinach 1 clove garlic, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1/2 teaspoon dried dill 1 pinch salt, 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley 5 marinated artichoke hearts 10 kalamata olives, 1/2 cup feta cheese 2 tablespoons olive oil, preheat the oven to 425 degrees f (220 degrees c). line a sheet pan with parchment paper. place flatbread in the center of the prepared pan and spread with cream cheese. in a small bowl, combine spinach, garlic, nutmeg, and dill. season with salt. spoon spinach mixture over cream cheese, separating any clumps, and press mixture down slightly into cream cheese. sprinkle parsley on top. place artichoke hearts evenly over spinach layer, and add kalamata olives around artichoke hearts. sprinkle with feta cheese. bake in the preheated oven until heated through, 8 to 10 minutes. remove from the oven and drizzle with olive oil. cut into 8 triangles.
ingredients_raw: ["1 piece flatbread", "1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened", "1/2 pound frozen spinach", "1 clove garlic,", "1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg", "1/2 teaspoon dried dill", "1 pinch salt,", "1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley", "5 marinated artichoke hearts", "10 Kalamata olives,", "1/2 cup feta cheese", "2 tablespoons olive oil,"]

description: This 3-ingredient limoncello spritz cocktail is light and refreshing, the perfect cocktail for hot summer days on the patio with family and friends.
combined_text: 3-ingredient limoncello spritz allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 2 fluid ounces limoncello 2 luid ounce lemon sparkling water 1 fluid ounce prosecco 1 lemon wedge (optional) fill cocktail shaker with ice and add the lemoncello; cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted, about 30 seconds. pour into a cocktail glass or wine glass. add lemon sparkling water. top glass off with prosecco and garnish with a lemon wedge.
ingredients_raw: ["2 fluid ounces limoncello", "2 luid ounce lemon sparkling water", "1 fluid ounce Prosecco", "1 lemon wedge (optional)"]

description: These salmon smash burgers are a flavorful twist on the classic beef smash burger, featuring patties made from fresh salmon. The salmon is chopped, then mixed with fresh dill and other seasonings. The combination of textures and fresh bold flavors makes it a perfect choice for seafood lovers.
combined_text: salmon smash burgers allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 1/2 pounds salmon filets, 1 large egg 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour 1 tablespoon fresh dill 1 (1 ounce) packet mccormick?? burger business by tabitha brown seasoning mix 1 tablespoon grapeseed oil gather all ingredients. chop salmon or place in a food processor, and pulse a few times to chop. combine salmon, egg, flour, dill, and burger seasoning in a bowl and mix gently. scoop about 1 cup mixture and form into a ball for 4 to 5 balls. heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large cast iron skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. place balls in the skillet, leaving plenty of space to smash them. using a burger press or spatula press each salmon ball to a thin layer. you may have to work in batches. cook for 2 to 3 minutes per side. serve as desired in burger buns with your favorite toppings.
ingredients_raw: ["1 1/2 pounds salmon filets,", "1 large egg", "1 tablespoon all-purpose flour", "1 tablespoon fresh dill", "1 (1 ounce) packet McCormick?? Burger Business by Tabitha Brown Seasoning Mix", "1 tablespoon grapeseed oil"]

description: This elote-inspired chopped salad is drizzled with a creamy, tangy dressing. It's Mexican street corn, in salad form.
combined_text: elote-inspired chopped salad allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 4 ears corn on the cob 1 cup omaine lettuce 1 cup cooked chicken 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1/2 cup red onion 1/2 cup fresh cilantro 1 green onion, 1 jalapeno, 1/2 cup cotija cheese 1 avocado using a sharp knife, remove kernels from the corn cob. freeze freshly shucked kernels overnight. place fresh corn into a heavy skillet over medium-high heat. cover and cook, without stirring, until a char develops on the corn, about 10 minutes. remove from heat. meanwhile, toss romaine, chicken, cherry tomatoes, red onion, green onion, cilantro, jalape?ño, cotija cheese, and avocado together in a bowl. toss in charred corn. for dressing, whisk crema con sal, mayonnaise, lime juice, and tajin together in a small bowl. drizzle over salad.
ingredients_raw: ["4 ears corn on the cob", "1 cup omaine lettuce", "1 cup cooked chicken", "1 cup cherry tomatoes,", "1/2 cup red onion", "1/2 cup fresh cilantro", "1 green onion,", "1 jalapeno,", "1/2 cup cotija cheese", "1 avocado"]

recipe_title: Grilled Peach, Halloumi, and Prosciutto Skewers
description: Wow your guests with these grilled peach, halloumi, and prosciutto skewers. Sweetly charred peaches, salty prosciutto, and grilled halloumi cheese skewers are topped with hot honey and pistachios.
combined_text: grilled peach, halloumi, and prosciutto skewers allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 3 peaches, 8 ounces halloumi cheese, 6 ounces prosciutto 2 tablespoons honey 2 tablespoons chopped pistachios preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate. thread peaches, halloumi, and prosciutto onto skewers. grill until caramelized with grill marks and softened, 3 to 4 minutes on each side. top with hot honey and chopped pistachios.
ingredients_raw: ["3 peaches,", "8 ounces halloumi cheese,", "6 ounces prosciutto", "2 tablespoons honey", "2 tablespoons chopped pistachios"]

description: This hibachi zucchini is so simple to make at home, you can have a Japanese steak house experience any time you like. It's a quick saute of zucchini and onion with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.
combined_text: hibachi zucchini allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 teaspoon vegetable oil 1 small onion 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1 teaspoon ginger paste 1 large zucchini 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper 1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. add onions; cook and stir for 4 minutes. add garlic and ginger. cook 1 minute more. add zucchini. cook 3 minutes more, stirring constantly. add soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper. cook until zucchini is as tender as you like, about 2 minutes more. garnish with sesame seeds.
ingredients_raw: ["1 teaspoon vegetable oil", "1 small onion", "1 teaspoon minced garlic", "1 teaspoon ginger paste", "1 large zucchini", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 tablespoon sesame oil", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper", "1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds"]

description: The Bramble is a tart, refreshing gin cocktail that perfectly balances bright citrus with juicy berry flavors. Built on a foundation of London Dry Gin, it's shaken with fresh lemon juice and a touch of simple syrup, then crowned with a drizzle of cr??me de m?¯re (blackberry liqueur) for a beautiful layered effect. It's typically served over crushed ice and garnished with fresh blackberries and a slice of lemon.
combined_text: bramble (cocktail) allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 cup ice cubes 2 ounces gin 1 ounce lemon juice 1/2 ounce simple syrup crushed ice 1/2 ounce blackberry liqueur) 2 or 3 blackberries 1 slice lemon add ice cubes, gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker. seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds. fill a rocks glass with crushed ice. strain cocktail into glass, then gently pour cr??me de m?¯re over the top to create a layered effect. the cr??me de m?¯re will sink down to the bottom of the glass. garnish with blackberries and a lemon slice.
ingredients_raw: ["1 cup ice cubes", "2 ounces gin", "1 ounce lemon juice", "1/2 ounce simple syrup", "crushed ice", "1/2 ounce blackberry liqueur)", "2 or 3 blackberries", "1 slice lemon"]

description: This summer crab salad is great for a sunny day. Cold crabmeat, pickles, tomatoes, and red onions, plus a few simple dressing ingredients create a salad that could go over lettuce or even served with tortilla chips.
combined_text: summer crab salad allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 3 cups crab meat 1/3 cup dill pickles 1/3 cup cherry tomatoes, 2 tablespoons red onions 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice 2 tablespoons mayonnaise 1/2 tablespoon cocktail sauce 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder gently mix crabmeat, pickles, tomatoes, red onions, lemon juice, mayonnaise, cocktail sauce, and garlic powder in a bowl and serve.
ingredients_raw: ["3 cups crab meat", "1/3 cup dill pickles", "1/3 cup cherry tomatoes,", "2 tablespoons red onions", "2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise", "1/2 tablespoon cocktail sauce", "1/2 teaspoon garlic powder"]

description: This chantilly cake is everything you could want in a dessert--it's light, creamy, decadent, and absolutely gorgeous. Use whatever fresh berries and flavor of jam you prefer; and make sure to keep the cake stored in the fridge.
combined_text: chantilly cake allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 1 tablespoon baking powder 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg 2 cups sugar 3 large eggs 3/4 cup sour cream 1/2 cup vegetable oil 2 teaspoons vanilla extract 1 teaspoon almond extract 1 cup whole milk preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c). grease and line 3 (8 inch) round cake pans with parchment paper; grease the parchment. sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg. in a large bowl, whisk together sugar, eggs, sour cream, oil, vanilla, and almond extract until completely smooth and combined. add in the dry ingredients and whisk until mostly incorporated. add in milk, and whisk until batter is mostly smooth. batter will be runny. divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cakes comes out mostly clean, 25 to 30 minutes. allow cakes to cool in the pan for 15 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. to make jam syrup, mix together jam, water, and lemon juice in a microwave-safe bowl. heat in the microwave for 30 seconds, then stir until mixture is thoroughly combined. brush jam syrup evenly over the top of cooled cakes. to make chantilly cream, beat together mascarpone and cream cheese on medium speed until smooth. add in heavy cream, powdered sugar, vanilla, and salt. beginning on low speed and gradually increasing to medium high, beat mixture until it holds stiff peaks. do not overbeat, or cream will curdle. to assemble, place 1 cake layer onto a plate or platter. top with a hefty dollop of chantilly cream and spread into an even layer. sprinkle 1/2 of berries over the top of the cream and gently press into the cream. top with second cake layer, and repeat adding cream and berries. top with the final cake layer. cover top and sides of cake with remaining cream. arrange remaining berries on top of cake as desired. place cake into the refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients_raw: ["2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour", "1 tablespoon baking powder", "1 teaspoon salt", "1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg", "2 cups sugar", "3 large eggs", "3/4 cup sour cream", "1/2 cup vegetable oil", "2 teaspoons vanilla extract", "1 teaspoon almond extract", "1 cup whole milk"]

description: These delicious chimichurri steak tacos have an Argentinian flair. Seared flank steak slices on tortillas are topped with chimichurri sauce, pickled onion, cotija, and cilantro.
combined_text: chimichurri steak tacos allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstar recipes 1 pound flank steak 1 teaspoons salt 2 tablespoons oil, 4 white corn tortillas 1/2 cup chimichurri sauce 1/4 cup red onions 1/2 cup cotija cheese cilantro gather all ingredients. sprinkle salt over steak to cover both sides. wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour or up to 1 day. heat a skillet over medium heat and add 1 tablespoon oil. fry tortillas, 1 at a time, on each side until puffy and golden brown, about 1 minute. set aside on a plate and cover with paper towels. sear steak in the same skillet, adding oil as needed; turn over frequently until browned, about 8 minutes per side. for medium-rare, steaks will be firm and reddish-pink and juicy in the center. an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 130 degrees f (54 degrees c) for medium rare. remove to a cutting board to rest. once rested, slice steak against the grain. serve in tortilla and top with onions, chimichurri, and shredded cheese. top with cilantro.
ingredients_raw: ["1 pound flank steak", "1 teaspoons salt", "2 tablespoons oil,", "4 white corn tortillas", "1/2 cup chimichurri sauce", "1/4 cup red onions", "1/2 cup cotija cheese", "cilantro"]

description: These leftover rotisserie chicken sliders are the perfect appetizer for game day, or anytime you just want something delicious. Shredded chicken, tomatoes, and provolone bake until golden and melty under a garlic-buttered bun.
combined_text: leftover rotisserie chicken sliders allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 small onion 2 cloves garlic 2 cups rotisserie chicken 1/2 cup bacon salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste 6 slider buns 1 roma tomato, 4 slices provolone cheese 1/4 cup butter fresh parsley, preheat the oven to 375 degrees f (190 degrees c). add olive oil to a skillet over medium heat. cook and stir onions and garlic until fragrant, about 2 minutes. stir in chicken and bacon; season lightly with salt and pepper. stir until heated through and coated in onion and garlic. slice slider buns in half. place bottom halves in a baking dish. layer on the garlic chicken mixture. add sliced tomatoes and provolone on top. close sliders with top buns. in a small saucepan, melt butter with a pinch of garlic or garlic powder. brush the tops of buns with garlic butter. bake sliders in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and tops are golden, 8 to 10 minutes. optional: broil sliders for 1 minute for extra crispy tops. remove sliders from the oven and brush with more garlic butter. garnish with parsley if you're feeling fancy, and serve hot and melty.
ingredients_raw: ["1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 small onion", "2 cloves garlic", "2 cups rotisserie chicken", "1/2 cup bacon", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste", "6 slider buns", "1 Roma tomato,", "4 slices provolone cheese", "1/4 cup butter", "fresh parsley,"]

description: This green goddess feta dip, a blend of fresh herbs, avocado, feta, and lime, is very versatile. Serve it with chips or crackers, or use it to dress a grilled steak or chicken.
combined_text: green goddess feta dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 5 ounces feta cheese 1 avocado, 3/4 cup olive oil 2 limes, juiced 1/4 cup fresh parsley leaves 1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves 1/4 cup green onions 1 garlic clove 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper salt to taste add feta, avocado, olive oil, lime juice, parsley, cilantro, green onions, garlic, and black pepper to the bowl of a food processor; blend until smooth. season to taste with salt.
ingredients_raw: ["5 ounces feta cheese", "1 avocado,", "3/4 cup olive oil", "2 limes, juiced", "1/4 cup fresh parsley leaves", "1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves", "1/4 cup green onions", "1 garlic clove", "1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper", "salt to taste"]

description: Hubby Dallas' makes this super spicy habanero salsa from the habaneros from our yard. Careful, this is very hot!
combined_text: dallas' spicy habanero salsa allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 3 habanero peppers 2 roma tomatoes 2 garlic cloves, peeled 1/4 white onion 1 1/2 teaspoons chicken bouillon powder, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a cast iron skillet. once heated, add habaneros, tomatoes, garlic, and onion. roast until charred., about 8 minutes place roasted veggies, remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, and chicken bouillon in a blender cup and blend until smooth.
ingredients_raw: ["3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil", "3 habanero peppers", "2 Roma tomatoes", "2 garlic cloves, peeled", "1/4 white onion", "1 1/2 teaspoons chicken bouillon powder,"]

description: Growing up, Harvey's crab dip was always on the table when having Maryland blue crabs along with saltine crackers. It's just a quick mix of ketchup, vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce.
combined_text: harvey's crab dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 3/4 cup ketchup 1/3 cup apple cider vinegar 2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce stir ketchup, vinegar, and worcestershire together in a bowl until smooth and combined.
ingredients_raw: ["3/4 cup ketchup", "1/3 cup apple cider vinegar", "2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce"]

recipe_title: Air Fryer Potato Slices with Dipping Sauce
description: These air fryer potato slices, served with a beer ketchup dipping sauce, are a tasty finger food somewhere between a French fry and a potato chip. Do take the time to make the dipping sauceƒ??it's worth it.
combined_text: air fryer potato slices with dipping sauce allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 3/4 cup ketchup 1/2 cup beer 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce 1/2 teaspoon onion powder 1/4 teaspoon cayenne 2 baking potatoes olive oil cooking spray 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder salt and freshly ground black pepper combine ketchup, beer, worcestershire sauce, onion powder, and cayenne in a small saucepan. bring to a boil, then reduce heat, and simmer for 3 to 5 minutes. remove from heat, and cool. cover and store in the refrigerator until ready to use. preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). spray the basket with cooking spray or line with a disposable parchment liner. slice potatoes 1/4-inch thick (use a mandoline if you have one), and place in a bowl. spray potatoes with olive oil spray, and sprinkle with garlic powder, salt and pepper. give the potatoes a good stir. place potatoes in a single layer in the air fryer, and cook, shaking occasionally, until they start to crisp up a bit and turn golden brown, 14 to 17 minutes. cooking times can vary depending on the brand and size of the fryer, and you may have to cook in batches. remove from the fryer, and serve with beer ketchup dipping sauce.
ingredients_raw: ["3/4 cup ketchup", "1/2 cup beer", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 teaspoon onion powder", "1/4 teaspoon cayenne", "2 baking potatoes", "olive oil cooking spray", "1/2 teaspoon garlic powder", "salt and freshly ground black pepper"]

description: These bacon-wrapped chicken skewers are seasoned chicken chunks wrapped in bacon, slathered in BBQ sauce, and served on a stick. Does it get better than this?
combined_text: bacon-wrapped chicken skewers allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 pound chicken breast 1/2 tablespoon olive oil 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder 1/4 teaspoon onion powder 1/4 teaspoon celery seed salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste 8 slices bacon, cut in half crosswise 1/3 cup barbecue sauce preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c) and line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil. place chicken pieces in a large bowl. add oil, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, celery seed, salt, and pepper. toss to evenly coat. take a chicken piece and roll tightly in bacon half. repeat with remaining chicken pieces. skewer bacon wrapped chicken pieces tightly on a skewer and place on the prepared baking sheet. bake skewers in the preheated oven 30 minutes. brush bbq sauce over skewers. bake until evenly browned, about 5 minutes more.
ingredients_raw: ["1 pound chicken breast", "1/2 tablespoon olive oil", "1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika", "1/4 teaspoon garlic powder", "1/4 teaspoon onion powder", "1/4 teaspoon celery seed", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste", "8 slices bacon, cut in half crosswise", "1/3 cup barbecue sauce"]

description: This loaded olive oil dip combines rich olive oil with white balsamic vinegar, chopped dates, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, and feta to make a great dip for your favorite crusty bread.
combined_text: loaded olive oil dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1/3 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar 2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes in oil 1 fresh fresh 4 olives, 3 tablespoons fresh thyme 3 tablespoons feta black pepper gather all ingredients. pour oil and balsamic vinegar into a shallow dish. use a spoon or a chopstick to mix well. position sun-dried tomatoes, olives, and dates on different sides of the shallow dish. sprinkle with thyme; top with feta and cracked pepper. serve with crusty bread.
ingredients_raw: ["1/3 cup olive oil", "3 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar", "2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes in oil", "1 fresh fresh", "4 olives,", "3 tablespoons fresh thyme", "3 tablespoons feta", "black pepper"]

description: These firecracker chicken meatballs give a big punch of flavor with a spicy, sweet, savory firecracker sauce. They're perfect for bite-size appetizers, game day snacks, or a main dish.
combined_text: firecracker chicken meatballs allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 large egg 2 tablespoons jalapeno pepper 1 tablespoon reduced-sodium soy sauce 1 teaspoon onion powder 1 teaspoon ground ginger 2 garlic cloves ground black pepper to taste 1 pound ground chicken 1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs gather all ingredients. preheat the oven to 475 degrees f (245 degrees c). line a large baking sheet with foil, and lightly spray with cooking spray. stir egg, jalape?ño, soy sauce, onion powder, ginger, garlic, and pepper together in a large bowl. add ground chicken and breadcrumbs, and gently mix just until just combined. form into meatballs using a 2-tablespoon cookie scoop; shape with wet hands. place on the prepared baking sheet. bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the center, 8 to 10 minutes. an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees f (71 degrees c). meanwhile, for firecracker sauce, combine hot sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, worcestershire, and red pepper flakes in a saucepan over medium-high heat. bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, then remove from heat to cool. the sauce will thicken slightly as it cools. dip each meatball into sauce or brush each meatball with sauce, return to the baking sheet, and cook for an additional 1 to 2 minutes. drizzle or brush with additional sauce as desired, sprinkle with chopped parsley, and serve. serve remaining sauce on the side for dipping.
ingredients_raw: ["1 large egg", "2 tablespoons jalapeno pepper", "1 tablespoon reduced-sodium soy sauce", "1 teaspoon onion powder", "1 teaspoon ground ginger", "2 garlic cloves", "ground black pepper to taste", "1 pound ground chicken", "1/2 cup panko breadcrumbs"]

description: This Mediterranean dipping oil, with finely chopped herbs, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives, plus lemon zest, smoked paprika, feta cheese, and more makes a sunny, flavorful oil dip for crusty bread.
combined_text: mediterranean dipping oil allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1/2 cup olive oil 1 tablespoon fresh oregano 2 tablespoons fresh dill 3 tablespoons feta cheese 2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes 2 tablespoons pimento-stuffed olives 1 garlic clove 1 teaspoon smoked paprika 1 lemon, zested 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper gather all ingredients. whisk olive oil, oregano, dill, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, garlic, paprika, lemon zest, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until well blended. serve and enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup olive oil", "1 tablespoon fresh oregano", "2 tablespoons fresh dill", "3 tablespoons feta cheese", "2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes", "2 tablespoons pimento-stuffed olives", "1 garlic clove", "1 teaspoon smoked paprika", "1 lemon, zested", "1/4 teaspoon salt", "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper"]

description: Make this 4-ingredient bruschetta dip when you need a quick and delicious appetizer! With only Boursin cheese, grape tomatoes, basil, and balsamic vinegar, it could not be simpler and tastes fantastic with toasted bread or crackers.
combined_text: 4-ingredient bruschetta dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 (5.2 counce) spreadable gourmet cheese, 8 grape tomatoes, chopped 5 basil leaves, 2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar 1 small ciabatta roll, gather all ingredients. spread soft cheese onto a plate to cover. layer tomatoes on top, then scatter basil on top of tomatoes. drizzle with balsamic. serve with ciabatta or crackers.
ingredients_raw: ["1 (5.2 counce) spreadable gourmet cheese,", "8 grape tomatoes, chopped", "5 basil leaves,", "2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar", "1 small ciabatta roll,"]

description: These gochujang pork belly bites are sweet and spicy, crispy and crunchy, and absolutely delicious. Whether you finish them with the gochujang sauce in the air fryer, or just dip them in the sauce at the end, they are irresistibly good.
combined_text: gochujang pork belly bites allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 pound pork belly 1/4 cup gochujang 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon honey, 1 teaspoon ground ginger preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). place pork belly pieces in the basket in a single layer, not touching. air fry for 8 to 9 minutes; turn over and air fry for 6 to 7 minutes more. meanwhile, for sauce, stir gochujang, soy sauce, hot honey, and ginger together in a medium bowl. remove pork belly from air fryer basket; toss in sauce to coat. return to the air fryer and fry until bites begin to char at the edges, 8 to 11 minutes more. (alternately, you can use sauce only for dipping; in this case, continue to fry without removing bites, until they begin to char, 6 to 7 minutes.)
ingredients_raw: ["1 pound pork belly", "1/4 cup gochujang", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 tablespoon honey,", "1 teaspoon ground ginger"]

description: For this Mediterranean flatbread, spread ready-made flatbread with a layer of cream cheese, top with garlicky spinach, artichoke hearts, Kalamata olives, and feta, then bake briefly in a very hot oven. It's a quick, delicious appetizer built on convenience.
combined_text: mediterranean flatbread allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 piece flatbread 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened 1/2 pound frozen spinach 1 clove garlic, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1/2 teaspoon dried dill 1 pinch salt, 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley 5 marinated artichoke hearts 10 kalamata olives, 1/2 cup feta cheese 2 tablespoons olive oil, preheat the oven to 425 degrees f (220 degrees c). line a sheet pan with parchment paper. place flatbread in the center of the prepared pan and spread with cream cheese. in a small bowl, combine spinach, garlic, nutmeg, and dill. season with salt. spoon spinach mixture over cream cheese, separating any clumps, and press mixture down slightly into cream cheese. sprinkle parsley on top. place artichoke hearts evenly over spinach layer, and add kalamata olives around artichoke hearts. sprinkle with feta cheese. bake in the preheated oven until heated through, 8 to 10 minutes. remove from the oven and drizzle with olive oil. cut into 8 triangles.
ingredients_raw: ["1 piece flatbread", "1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened", "1/2 pound frozen spinach", "1 clove garlic,", "1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg", "1/2 teaspoon dried dill", "1 pinch salt,", "1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley", "5 marinated artichoke hearts", "10 Kalamata olives,", "1/2 cup feta cheese", "2 tablespoons olive oil,"]

recipe_title: Grilled Peach, Halloumi, and Prosciutto Skewers
description: Wow your guests with these grilled peach, halloumi, and prosciutto skewers. Sweetly charred peaches, salty prosciutto, and grilled halloumi cheese skewers are topped with hot honey and pistachios.
combined_text: grilled peach, halloumi, and prosciutto skewers allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 3 peaches, 8 ounces halloumi cheese, 6 ounces prosciutto 2 tablespoons honey 2 tablespoons chopped pistachios preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate. thread peaches, halloumi, and prosciutto onto skewers. grill until caramelized with grill marks and softened, 3 to 4 minutes on each side. top with hot honey and chopped pistachios.
ingredients_raw: ["3 peaches,", "8 ounces halloumi cheese,", "6 ounces prosciutto", "2 tablespoons honey", "2 tablespoons chopped pistachios"]

description: These savory palmiers are appealing on so many levels. The combination of bacon, Gruyere, and caramelized onion in crisp puff pastry is delicious, and these appetizer pastries are beautiful as well.
combined_text: savory palmiers allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 sheet puff pastry 1/4 cup horseradish sauce or honey mustard dressing 1/2 cup gruyere cheese 1/3 cup caramelized onion 2 slices thick cut bacon, cooked and crumbled lay puff pastry out on a lightly floured surface. brush pastry with horseradish sauce. sprinkle evenly with gruyere. sprinkle onions evenly over, then scatter evenly with bacon. starting with a long side, roll and tuck pastry to the center. repeat on the other long side, rolling until the 2 scrolled sides meet in the center. pinch together to ensure they hold together. wrap pastry in plastic wrap and freeze for about 20 minutes. meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment. remove pastry to a cutting board. slice into 1/3-inch slices; lay slices on the prepared baking sheet. bake in the preheated oven until until golden brown and puffed, 15 to 20 minutes. rotate pan halfway through cooking time. serve with more horseradish sauce for dipping.
ingredients_raw: ["1 sheet puff pastry", "1/4 cup horseradish sauce or honey mustard dressing", "1/2 cup gruyere cheese", "1/3 cup caramelized onion", "2 slices thick cut bacon, cooked and crumbled"]

description: These French dip sliders may seem time-consuming to make, but they use a lot of shortcuts, so they're easier than you think. Caramelizing onions does take some timeƒ??feel free to use crispy fried onions instead if you're in a rush.
combined_text: french dip sliders allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 (12-count) package slider buns 9 tablespoons butter, divided 1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced 1 pound deli roast beef 9 slices gruyere cheese 1 tablespoon garlic powder 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce 1 tablespoon dried parsley gather all ingredients. preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c). grease a 9x13-inch baking dish. slice the slider buns in half horizontally without separating them, and place the bottom half in the prepared dish. in a heavy skillet over medium heat, melt 1 tablespoon butter; add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft and golden, 8 to 10 minutes. layer roast beef evenly over bottom buns, then layer cheese slices over beef. scatter caramelized onion over cheese, and add top buns back on. melt remaining butter and stir in garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, and parsley; brush over tops of buns. cover with foil. bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. uncover and bake until tops are golden and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes more. meanwhile, for jus, combine bone broth, worcestershire, soy sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, and fish sauce in a small saucepan. bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, over medium heat. stir cornstarch and water together in a small bowl to create a smooth slurry; add to the broth, and simmer until slightly thickened, 2 to 3 minutes. serve sliders with the jus for dipping.
ingredients_raw: ["1 (12-count) package slider buns", "9 tablespoons butter, divided", "1 medium yellow onion, thinly sliced", "1 pound deli roast beef", "9 slices Gruyere cheese", "1 tablespoon garlic powder", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "1 tablespoon dried parsley"]

description: This smoked queso dip has all the flavors you love in a queso with an added punch of flavor from the smoker. This will be the first thing to go at your next tailgate party. Serve with tortilla chips.
combined_text: smoked queso dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 onion, chopped 1 (1 pound) tube bulk sausage, crumbled 2 pounds processed cheese food, such as velveeta?? 8 ounces cheddar cheese 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chiles 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup 2 large whole jalapeno peppers preheat an outdoor smoker to 225 degrees f (107 degrees c). add onion and sausage to a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat for 8 minutes. drain any excess grease and add sausage back to the skillet. to the skillet, add velveeta, shredded cheddar, ro-tel and cream of chicken soup. stir to combine. transfer to a 9x9-inch disposable aluminum pan. place pan on a rack in the smoker. place whole jalapenos next to the pan. smoke for 2 hours, stirring the cheese mixture every hour. transfer jalapenos to a cutting board. cut in half lengthwise. discard seeds and vein. chop jalapenos and stir into the cheese mixture. smoke for 1 hour more. stir and serve immediately.
ingredients_raw: ["1 onion, chopped", "1 (1 pound) tube bulk sausage, crumbled", "2 pounds processed cheese food, such as Velveeta??", "8 ounces Cheddar cheese", "2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chiles", "1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup", "2 large whole jalapeno peppers"]

recipe_title: Air Fryer Honey Sriracha Salmon Bites
description: These air fryer honey Sriracha salmon bites are cubes of salmon, lightly seasoned with salt, pepper, olive oil, and a touch of Sriracha, then air fried to crispy perfection and drizzled with a bold, sticky honey-Sriracha sauce. These bites are perfect as an appetizer, rice bowl topping, or paired with a side of roasted vegetables.
combined_text: air fryer honey sriracha salmon bites allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon honey 1 tablespoon sriracha 1 teaspoon rice vinegar 1/4 teaspoon granulated garlic preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). whisk soy sauce, honey, 1 tablespoon sriracha, rice vinegar, and granulated garlic together in a small bowl. set aside. pat salmon dry and cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes. toss salmon in olive oil, 1/2 tablespoon sriracha, salt, and pepper. spray basket of the air fryer with cooking spray. place seasoned salmon in the basket of the air fryer, working in batches to avoid overcrowding, if necessary. cook in the preheated air fryer for 4 minutes. gently turn salmon pieces and cook until salmon flakes easily with a fork, 3 to 4 more minutes. place on a serving platter, drizzle with honey-sriracha sauce, and garnish with green onion and sesame seeds. serve immediately.
ingredients_raw: ["1 tablespoon soy sauce", "1 tablespoon honey", "1 tablespoon Sriracha", "1 teaspoon rice vinegar", "1/4 teaspoon granulated garlic"]

description: These 2-ingredient bacon-wrapped mozzarella sticks are a spin on deep fried mozzarella sticks. Remember, bacon makes anything better, and by freezing the cheese first, the bacon wrap fries crisp while the cheese melts inside for a decadent treat.
combined_text: 2-ingredient bacon-wrapped mozzarella sticks allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 4 mozzarella string cheese sticks 4 slices bacon 1/4 cup avocado oil gather all ingredients. place mozzarella sticks in the freezer until completely frozen, about 30 minutes. wrap each stick with 1 slice of bacon, tucking ends in so cheese is completely covered. secure bacon on the ends with a toothpick if necessary. heat oil in a skillet to medium heat. fry cheese sticks in hot oil, turning gently to brown and crisp on all sides. remove from skillet; pat with paper towels to soak up any excess oil. serve with dipping sauce.
ingredients_raw: ["4 mozzarella string cheese sticks", "4 slices bacon", "1/4 cup avocado oil"]

description: This asparagus ricotta tart has it all: a buttery, flaky crust, a cheesy herb filling, and a topping of fresh asparagus. It is an excellent brunch or appetizer option.
combined_text: asparagus ricotta tart allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 pound asparagus 1 cup full fat ricotta cheese 1 large egg 1/4 cup siago cheese 1 1/2 tablespoons italian seasoning 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 sheet puff pastry 1 tablespoon olive oil preheat the oven to 400 degrees f (200 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment paper. bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat. reduce heat to medium and add asparagus. cook until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes. remove asparagus from the pot and immediately dunk them in cold water. drain; blot asparagus dry with a paper towel. crack egg into a small bowl and beat lightly. measure out about 1 tablespoon beaten egg and set aside to use for egg wash. to the bowl with remaining egg, add ricotta, asiago cheese, italian seasoning, salt, and pepper and whisk until thoroughly combined. roll puff pastry out on a lightly floured surface into a large rectangle, about 10x15 inches, and place onto the prepared baking sheet. dip a pastry brush into remaining beaten egg, and brush a 1-inch border around the edges of pastry. add ricotta filling to center of the puff pastry and smooth into an even layer, leaving a 1-inch border on all sides. arrange asparagus over filling. drizzle asparagus with olive oil and season with salt and pepper, if desired. bake tart in the preheated oven until puff pastry is puffed and browned on the edges, 25 to 30 minutes. cool tart for a few minutes, then cut into 8 squares. serve slightly warm or at room temperature.
ingredients_raw: ["1 pound asparagus", "1 cup full fat ricotta cheese", "1 large egg", "1/4 cup siago cheese", "1 1/2 tablespoons Italian seasoning", "1/2 teaspoon kosher salt", "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,", "1 sheet puff pastry", "1 tablespoon olive oil"]

description: These Mediterranean flatbreads are packed with fresh flavor, piled with tomatoes, Kalamata olives, red onion, pepperoncini, and feta cheese. They look a little fancy, but are uncomplicated and perfect for a quick meal or appetizer.
combined_text: mediterranean flatbread allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 2 flatbreads 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil 3 garlic cloves, 2 cups cherry or grape tomatoes 1/2 cup sliced kalamata olives 1/2 red onion, 1/3 cup pepperoncini 3 tablespoons feta cheese fresh oregano, preheat the oven to 425 degrees f (220 degrees c). combine olive oil and garlic in a small bowl. lightly brush a little garlic olive oil over the flatbreads. add tomatoes, olives, onion, and pepperoncini to a bowl; drizzle with remaining garlic olive oil, and gently combine. evenly top flatbreads with the tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese, and place on a baking sheet. bake. in the preheated oven until flatbreads are starting to turn golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes. sprinkle with chopped oregano and serve.
ingredients_raw: ["2 flatbreads", "1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil", "3 garlic cloves,", "2 cups cherry or grape tomatoes", "1/2 cup sliced Kalamata olives", "1/2 red onion,", "1/3 cup pepperoncini", "3 tablespoons feta cheese", "fresh oregano,"]

description: These chopped cheese sliders are a slider version of the much-loved New York sandwich with ground beef, American cheese, shredded lettuce, and a special sauce on Hawaiian rolls.
combined_text: chopped cheese sliders allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1/4 cup mayonnaise 2 tablespoons ketchup 1 tablespoon yellow mustard 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste gather all ingredients. stir mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, garlic powder, and paprika together in a small bowl; season with salt and pepper. set aside. heat a large skillet over medium heat. add ground beef, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned, about 8 minutes. drain excess fat, if desired. lower heat to avoid overcooking beef, and lay cheese slices directly over beef. allow to melt, about 3 minutes more, then chop beef and cheese together to create that signature chopped cheese texture. slice hawaiian rolls in half horizontally, keeping them attached. spread chopped cheese sauce on both halves of rolls. evenly distribute beef and cheese mixture over bottom half. top with chopped lettuce, onion, and pickles. place top buns back on and enjoy!
ingredients_raw: ["1/4 cup mayonnaise", "2 tablespoons ketchup", "1 tablespoon yellow mustard", "1/2 teaspoon garlic powder", "1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste"]

description: These 5-ingredient croque monsieur sliders are a fantastic appetizer. Think ham and cheese sliders that are neither too sweet or savory. The soft fluffy Hawaiian rolls knock this recipe out of the park.
combined_text: croque monsieur sliders allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 tablespoon butter, 1 teaspoon dijon mustard 4 hawaiian rolls 2 slices deli ham, cut in half 1 cup shredded gruyere cheese preheat the oven to 375 degrees f (180 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment. open up rolls but keep them attached. lay them flat on the baking sheet. stir mustard and butter together; spread over inner sides of rolls, on both top and bottom. add a half piece of ham to bottom half of each roll; fold as needed to fit. sprinkle each roll with a small amount of cheese. close rolls over filling. melt remaining butter and mustard mixture; brush over tops of rolls. sprinkle each roll evenly with remaining cheese. bake in the preheated oven until cheese is completely melted, about 10 minutes. serve warm with more mustard for dipping.
ingredients_raw: ["1 tablespoon butter,", "1 teaspoon Dijon mustard", "4 Hawaiian rolls", "2 slices deli ham, cut in half", "1 cup shredded Gruyere cheese"]

description: This hot honey shrimp has a dazzling flavor profileƒ??sticky, tangy, and just a little sweet heat. Serve as an appetizer, on skewers if you like, or feel free to add the shrimp to some stir fry vegetables for dinner.
combined_text: hot honey shrimp allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1/2 cup reduced-sodium soy sauce 2 tablespoons brown sugar 2 tablespoons rice vinegar 1 tablespoon honey 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1 teaspoon sesame oil 1/4 cup water 1 tablespoon cornstarch stir soy sauce, brown sugar, rice vinegar, honey, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, water, and cornstarch together in a small bowl. set aside. pat shrimp dry with a paper towel. season with salt and pepper. heat a skillet over medium-high heat. add vegetable oil; once oil is shimmering, cook shrimp until tails begin to curl, about 3 minutes. pour in sauce; bring to a simmer and cook until shrimp is bright pink and opaque and sauce is thickened, about 2 minutes. sprinkle with black sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup reduced-sodium soy sauce", "2 tablespoons brown sugar", "2 tablespoons rice vinegar", "1 tablespoon honey", "1/4 teaspoon ground ginger", "1 teaspoon minced garlic", "1 teaspoon sesame oil", "1/4 cup water", "1 tablespoon cornstarch"]

description: This whipped Boursin dip comes together in minutes, and is very versatile. Garnish with a drizzle of hot honey or olive oil, a sprig of rosemary or thyme, or maybe some sliced Kalamata olives or crispy bacon and serve with crackers or vegetables.
combined_text: whipped boursin dip allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 (10.5 ounce) package goat cheese 1 (5.3 ounce) package garlic and fine herbs spreadable cheese, 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil 1 teaspoon lemon zest salt to taste place goat cheese, boursin, olive oil, and lemon zest in a food processor and blend until you have a smooth and whipped texture. season with salt. garnish as desired, and serve. store in an airtight container in the fridge.
ingredients_raw: ["1 (10.5 ounce) package goat cheese", "1 (5.3 ounce) package garlic and fine herbs spreadable cheese,", "1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil", "1 teaspoon lemon zest", "salt to taste"]

recipe_title: These 2-Ingredient Stuffed Peppers Are the Ultimate Last-Minute Appetizer
description: These 2-ingredient Boursin-stuffed peppadew peppers could not be easier. Sweet and mildly spicy peppadew peppers are filled with creamy Boursin cheese for a yummy bite-sized treat. Serve with crackers, olives, and cured meats for an easy, elegant appetizer platter.
combined_text: these 2-ingredient stuffed peppers are the ultimate last-minute appetizer allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 12 to 14 peppadew peppers 1 (5.3-ounce) package shallot and chive spreadable cheese gently pat peppers dry with a paper towel. spoon boursin cheese into a small resealable plastic bag, then snip off one corner to create a makeshift piping bag. carefully pipe cheese into each pepper until full and slightly mounded.
ingredients_raw: ["12 to 14 peppadew peppers", "1 (5.3-ounce) package shallot and chive spreadable cheese"]

description: OMG the flavors of these Boursin stuffed dates REALLY surprised me. Filled with Boursin, almonds, and prosciutto, and baked until bubbly, these little bites of heaven are the perfect balance of savory and natural sweetness.
combined_text: boursin stuffed dates allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 18 pitted dates 1 (5.2 ounce) package gournay cheese, such as boursin?? shallot & chive flavor 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 2 ounces prosciutto honey fresh parsley, f preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment. place boursin in a bowl and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. set aside a small amount of almonds and prosciutto for garnish; add almonds and prosciutto to the bowl and mix well by hand. make a slit in each date lengthwise, without cutting all the way through and leaving ends intact. use your fingers to gently open the date. use a small melon baller to scoop some of boursin mixture and place inside the date. place dates on the prepared baking sheet. bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes. remove from oven, drizzle with honey, and garnish with almonds, prosciutto, and fresh parsley.
ingredients_raw: ["18 pitted dates", "1 (5.2 ounce) package gournay cheese, such as Boursin?? Shallot & Chive Flavor", "1/2 cup slivered almonds,", "2 ounces prosciutto", "honey", "fresh parsley, f"]

description: This copycat pickle de gallo is my version of the popular pickle-based pico de gallo, and it is the perfect topping for pulled pork tacos, fish tacos, to serve with barbecued ribs, or as a dip for tortilla chips. This may sound odd, but I like to dress up my cottage cheese with it. The possibilities are endless.
combined_text: copycat pickle de gallo allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 1/2 spear pickles, such as claussen, 1/4 pound mini bell peppers 1 jalapeno 2 tablespoons red onion 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon dried dill 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt gather all ingredients combine pickles, mini bell peppers, jalapeno, red onion, lemon juice, dill, and salt in a large bowl. cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 1 hour before serving.
ingredients_raw: ["1 1/2 spear pickles, such as Claussen,", "1/4 pound mini bell peppers", "1 jalapeno", "2 tablespoons red onion", "1 tablespoon lemon juice", "1 teaspoon dried dill", "1/4 teaspoon kosher salt"]

description: You only need 4 ingredients for these mini pepper pizza bites. The first thing to go whenever I host a Super Bowl party, they are crunchy, saucy, and cheesy, plus lower in carbs than traditional pizza bites.
combined_text: 4-ingredient pepper pizza bites allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 8 ounces mini bell peppers 3/4 cup marinara sauce 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese 1 ounce pepperoni slices preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c) and line a baking sheet with parchment. place sliced mini bells on the baking sheet, cut sides up. divide marinara sauce between peppers using a small spoon. top peppers with cheese. place 3 slices of mini pepperoni on top of cheese in each pepper. bake in the preheated oven for 12 minutes. turn the oven's broiler to high, and broil peppers until cheese is melted and starting to brown, about 3 minutes.
ingredients_raw: ["8 ounces mini bell peppers", "3/4 cup marinara sauce", "1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese", "1 ounce pepperoni slices"]

description: Marinated mozzarella balls take advantage of the fact that mozzarella balls are creamy, and somewhat neutral flavored. They're just waiting for a zingy herb-packed marinade to turn them into one of the easiest and tastiest appetizers ever.
combined_text: marinated mozzarella balls allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil 2 tablespoons oil packed sun-dried tomatoes 1 tablespoon fresh parsley 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil 2 garlic cloves 1 teaspoon italian seasoning 1 teaspoon lemon zest 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes salt and freshly ground black pepper 8 ounces fresh mozzarella balls in wate 1/3 cup pimento-stuffed olives for marinade, combine olive oil, sun-dried tomatoes, parsley, basil, garlic, italian seasoning, lemon zest, lemon juice, and red pepper flakes in a bowl; season with salt and pepper. add mozzarella balls and olives to marinade, gently tossing until well coated, and balls are mostly submerged in marinade. cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or preferably overnight. if possible, stir occasionally. store in a tightly-covered glass jar in the refrigerator. olive oil will solidify, so remove from the fridge about 15 minutes before serving so that olive oil can liquefy.
ingredients_raw: ["1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil", "2 tablespoons oil packed sun-dried tomatoes", "1 tablespoon fresh parsley", "1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil", "2 garlic cloves", "1 teaspoon Italian seasoning", "1 teaspoon lemon zest", "1 teaspoon lemon juice", "1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes", "salt and freshly ground black pepper", "8 ounces fresh mozzarella balls in wate", "1/3 cup pimento-stuffed olives"]

description: These pickle brine pickled eggs soak in a bold brine made from pickle brine, white vinegar, and crushed garlic, infusing them with a zesty, garlicky kick. Enjoy them after a few days for a mild tang or let them sit longer for an extra punch. Depending on what brand of pickle brine you use, you may need to adjust the amount of vinegar or salt, depending on your taste.
combined_text: pickle brine pickled eggs allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 cup pickle brine 1/2 cup white vinegar 2 cloves garlic 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt 12 medium hard boiled eggs combine pickle brine, vinegar, and garlic cloves in a saucepan; bring to a simmer. add kosher salt. remove saucepan from heat and cool liquid slightly. place eggs in a 1-quart jar. pour vinegar mixture over eggs. seal the jar and refrigerate, occasionally shaking the jar, for at least 2 days.
ingredients_raw: ["1 cup pickle brine", "1/2 cup white vinegar", "2 cloves garlic", "1/4 teaspoon kosher salt", "12 medium hard boiled eggs"]

description: This sloppy Joe garlic bread is a great way to use up the leftovers from making sloppy Joes, or even chili, but if you don't have leftovers, you can buy any number of canned or jarred versions.
combined_text: sloppy joe garlic bread allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 2 cups beef sloppy joe 1 ciabatta roll 2 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, to taste 1/2 cup sharp cheddar cheese 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese chopped parsley, for garnish preheat the oven to 375 degrees f (190 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment paper. lay ciabatta halves, cut sides up, on the parchment paper. if the top half rocks a bit, just slice a bit off the top so that it lays flat. butter cut sides, then lightly sprinkle with garlic salt. spread sloppy joe mixture over to cover bread to the edges. sprinkle with cheddar cheese, then mozzarella cheese. bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 15 minutes. to serve as an appetizer, slice each half into 2 pieces. sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients_raw: ["2 cups beef sloppy Joe", "1 ciabatta roll", "2 tablespoons butter,", "garlic salt, to taste", "1/2 cup sharp Cheddar cheese", "1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese", "chopped parsley, for garnish"]

description: This olive cheese bread is a sweet-spicy-salty-cheesy olive dip with a hint of the ever popular Bang Bang Sauce, spread on crusty French bread, toasted, and served as an appetizer.
combined_text: olive cheese bread allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 loaf french bread 1/2 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup unsalted butter 2 tablespoons thai sweet chili sauce 2 tablespoons sriracha sauce 8 ounces monterey jack cheese, shredded 1 cup black olives 1 cup pimento-stuffed green olives 2 green onions, chopped fresh parsley, preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (180 degrees c). line a baking sheet with parchment. scoop out just a little from the cut side of each bread slice to make a shallow well, and place on the prepared baking sheet. combine mayonnaise, butter, thai chili sauce, and sriracha in a bowl. fold in cheese, olives, and green onions until well combined. evenly spread olive mixture on cut sides of bread. bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and starting to brown, 25 to 30 minutes. set aside for 5 minutes to allow the cheese to firm up slightly; sprinkle with parsley. slice each bread half into 2-inch portions, and serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients_raw: ["1 loaf French bread", "1/2 cup mayonnaise", "1/2 cup unsalted butter", "2 tablespoons Thai sweet chili sauce", "2 tablespoons Sriracha sauce", "8 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, shredded", "1 cup black olives", "1 cup pimento-stuffed green olives", "2 green onions,", "chopped fresh parsley,"]

description: These wasabi shrimp sushi cups are perfect for you if rolling sushi is not in your wheelhouse. Certainly filling a muffin cup is! Prepare sushi rice according to the package instructions, but do not fluffƒ??the success of this dish depends on very sticky rice. Use a silicone muffin pan, if you have one. While the rice cooks, prepare the filling ingredients.
combined_text: wasabi shrimp sushi cups allrecipes allstar recipes allrecipes allstars appetizers 1 tablespoon wasabi paste 1 teaspoon soy sauce 2 tablespoons mayonnaise for wasabi aioli; combine wasabi paste, soy sauce, and mayonnaise in a small, zippered food storage bag. gently squeeze the bag to combine ingredients. taste and add more wasabi paste, if desired. seal the bag and refrigerate. place about 1/8 cup cooked and cooled rice in each of 8 silicone muffin cups. press rice firmly into the cup, using damp fingertips. shape some of the rice up the sides of the cup. refrigerate at least 20 minutes. to serve, fill rice cups with matchstick carrots, matchstick cucumbers, and edamame. place one shrimp half on top of each filled cup. snip the tip off 1 corner of wasabi aioli bag, and squeeze contents across the top of each filled cup. sprinkle with black sesame seeds. serve immediately with pickled ginger.
ingredients_raw: ["1 tablespoon wasabi paste", "1 teaspoon soy sauce", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise"]

description: Gochujang Hummus is a bold and flavorful twist on classic hummus, blending the creamy richness of chickpeas with the deep, spicy-sweet heat of Korean gochujang. Try to make this a day ahead; the flavor develops the longer it sits. Use 1 tablespoon gochujang for a mild heat, or use 2 tablespoons if you like things a little spicier.
